levelDescription: With the torch in hand you can make out the end of the hallway in front of you.
What are you doing back here again? This is certainly not the right way
You can make out that the sobbing is coming from your right.
The sobbing returns, you can make out that it's coming from your right.
The sobbing returns, you can make out that it's coming from behind you.
The sobbing increases, you can hear it in both your ears.
The gate has now opened. You can make out that the sobbing is coming in front of you.
As you put in the key and turn it you hear the gate begin to open.
The sobbing increases, you can see a corridor on your left.
The sobbing becomes significantly louder, you can make out a figure in front of you sitting on the floor.

On the floor, there's a dark-haired girl sitting on the ground, with her head in her hands covering her face. As you walk up and lay your hand on her shoulder, she crumbles into ash. You jump back, shook by the event. In the ash there's a blue key. Could this be the final piece of the puzzle?
